All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentScreen
Controller class that allows the user to add an appointment.
AddCustomerScreen
Controller class that allows the user to add a customer.
Appointment
Appointment class that creates appointment objects.
AppointmentQuery
Abstract database class for all queries related to appointments.
Contact
Contact class that creates contact objects.
ContactQuery
Abstract database class for all queries related to contacts.
Country
Country class that creates country objects.
CountryQuery
Abstract database class for all queries related to countries.
Customer
Customer class that creates customer objects.
CustomerQuery
Abstract database class for all queries related to customers.
Division
Customer class that creates Division objects.
FirstLevelDivQuery
Abstract database class for all queries related to first-level division.
JDBC
Abstract database interface class.
Lists
List class that creates and manipulates observable array lists.
LoginScreen
Controller class that will allow or deny a user to use the application.
Main
Main entry point of the program before passing onto the MainScreen controller.
MainScreen
Controller class where the user manages customers and appointments.
ModifyAppointmentScreen
Controller class that allows the user to modify an appointment.
ModifyCustomerScreen
Controller class that allows the user to modify a customer.
ReportScreen
Controller class that shows the customer various reports.
User
User class that creates user objects.
UserQuery
Abstract database class for all queries related to users.
